= Getting libraries =

You can get Arduino core sources from [http://code.google.com/p/arduino/source/browse/trunk/hardware/arduino/cores/arduino trunk/hardware/arduino/cores/arduino] path, or by this command:
{{{
svn checkout http://arduino.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/hardware/arduino/cores/arduino arduino
}}}

Arduino libraries locate at [http://code.google.com/p/arduino/source/browse/trunk/libraries trunk/libraries] path. You can use 
{{{
svn checkout http://arduino.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/libraries arduino-libraries
}}}

= Using =

To use any core function or library, simply 
{{{
#include "needed-file.c"
}}}
